sourcesContent: import React from "react"; export default function AssetRow({ asset, onChange, onRemove }) { return ( onChange(asset.id, "ticker", e.target.value)} placeholder="Ticker" /> onChange(asset.id, "avgPrice", e.target.value)} placeholder="$0.00" /> onChange(asset.id, "holdings", e.target.value)} placeholder="0" /> onChange(asset.id, "targetWeight", e.target.value)} placeholder="%" /> — ); }
